issue.title: [Website] Transition to new .asf.yaml machinery for website publishing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ASF is providing a new configuration option for website publishing

https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/INFRA/git+-+.asf.yaml+features

This is timely since I've found deploys to be slow of late via the current mechanism

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-18987
